text: 20.17 Sng 22.22, Mat 28.10, Lom 8.29, Epe 1.17, Hib 2.11-12 Agek Jisas agak, Bapi yɨl adek alaŋ adɨkɨd ma abin tek, yɨp ma dɨnɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Pen nad mam yad okok kɨlop am agɨnɨmɨn, Jisas agup, Adek alaŋ adɨkɨd amebin, Bapi yad yɨl amebin alaŋ, Nap nɨbi abe agup agɨnɨmɨn agak. Ne God yad mɨdɨl, God nɨbi abe mɨdɨl gup agup agɨnɨmɨn agak.
